name: Escape Pod
description: Your thoughts were of fear before settling into a growing sense of elation. The pods' alarms were blaring and the interface before you both told you the same thing: you had crashed. You had lived.

name: The Beach
description: The Beach was calm its waves peacefully lapping at the shore as the sun beamed down. It seemed to be midday, the sun felt hot on your skin as you began to sweat. Your eyes noticed something lay half\nburied in the sand as you scanned your surroundings. In the distance over the water you could make out some manmade facility, to the right was a jungle leading inland.

name: Jungle
description: Making your way through the lush jungle canopy, you found a welcome shield from the relentless onslaught of the suns' scorching rays. The jungle is filled with the harmonious calls of tropical\nbirds, their melodies as alien as they are enchanting.

name: Main Plaza
description:
You stumble upon a settlement. As you enter the main plaza, a profound stillness blankets the area. The only sound that disturbs this silence is the sound of your feet echoing on the pavement and the
gentle, soothing sounds of the central fountain gracing the plaza. From here is a path back to the jungle. Nearby you notice signs to various places important to the colony. The one closest is a sign
with the words "Arquebus Interplanetary Spaceport" leading onto a high way ramp. Its catapult noticeable from here. Farther away in another direction you can see a collapsed bridge with a sign marking
it as the "Residential District." Finally the last sign of note was in the direction of a large tunnel you can see is flooded with the words "Schneider Research Laboratories overhead."

name: Arquebus Planetary Spaceport
description: Approaching the spaceport, the imposing Arquebus magnetic catapult, from which the Arquebus corporation derives its name, towers above you like a colossal sentinel. As you delve further into the\nfacility, you discover a well-maintained shuttle bay housing an intact "Bolt" class shuttle, ready for action. Within the hangar, you also spot charging outlets designed for rejuvenating shuttle power\nsupplies and a series of storage lockers, their contents perhaps holding valuable equipment or tools for maintenance. Looking out of the hangar door, you see the road leading back to the colony plaza.

name: Cargo Bay
description: As you navigate through the murky waters, past a haunting array of derelict vehicles. With quick thinking, you\nswim towards the tunnel's end, where a massive airlock leads you into a cargo loading bay. Within this chamber, you find two sealed bulkheads. The bulkhead to the north is labeled "External Maintenance Hatch." To the east is the airlock leading back to the collapsed tunnel, now in ruins.\nThe south bulkhead bears the label "Reactor Core."

name: Reactor Core
description: You find yourself in the reactor room. In the center of the chamber is a small\ngeothermal generator. As you move your gaze downward, you spot rows of energy capacitors and backup reactors every few layers below.

name: Victory
description:
You made it out alive!!!!
 VICTORY
Quit and start the game to play again
